location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Captain Thomas Farmer, commander of the Revenge

mods.abstract: The letter is an order to proceed to Bussora [Basra] with the fleet under the command of Captain John Ward of the Eagle.At the foot of the letter is a note that reads 'The same, to Captain Gabriel Henderson of the Essexstoreship and Captain Thomas Lyon, of the Successsnow'. This means that the above orders were repeated to these individuals but the letters have not been copied out in full.
